Description.1:
## Job Description

![](https://counter.adcourier.com/TW9oYW1tZWQuQWJkdWwuNTYxMzEuNDA3M0BiY2ZvcndhcmQuYXBsaXRyYWsuY29t.gif)  
  

Java Developer

  

 **BCforward is currently seeking highly motivated Java Developer in
Mississauga, ON**

  

  

We place consultants for end clients all over CANADA & USA.

  

 ****

  

**Job Title: Java Developer**

  

 **Location: Mississauga, ON**

  

 **Anticipated Duration: 12 Months Contract with possible extension or
permanent depending on the performance of the candidate and client needs**

  

  

**Required Skillset:**

  

  

  * Strong Knowledge in JAVA, Rest API, Unix/Linux Shell scripting and Python
  

  * 3+ years of sound technical experience in Information Technology field or IT Consulting Services.
  

  * A disciplined and thoughtful approach to design, coding and supportability of applications.
  

  * Strong communication, teamwork and consensus-building skills.
  

  * Experience in programming/debugging used in business applications
  

  * Working knowledge of industry practice and standards
  

  * Comprehensive knowledge of specific business area for application development
  

  * Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication
  

  

  

**Roles and Responsibility:**

  

  

  * Candidate will need to work with team members locally as well as globally.
  

  * Will need to work with Quants to productionize Python Models
  

  * Candidate will work independently with business owners, global teams and stakeholders.
  

  * Applies skills and knowledge of the tools to develop creative solutions to meet client and business needs .
  

  * Opportunity to work with highly motivated team to deliver cutting edge latest technologies. Work with the Project Lead and Business owners to understand the Global Requirements.
  

  * Taking ownership to deliver projects by full development lifecycle of project.
  

  * Create performance efficient Code and should have experience with design and development.
  

  * Understands deployment/entitlement strategies.
  

  * Develop and manage a communication program to ensure that the partner organizations are kept apprised of progress of conducting periodic reviews with work stream Business Leads and Key Stakeholders
  

  

  

**About BCforward:**

  

BCforward began as an IT business solution and staffing firm. Founded in 1998,
BCforward has grown with our customers' needs into a full-service personnel
solution's organization. Headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, BCforward
also operates numerous delivery centers across North America and India. We are
currently the largest consulting firm and largest MBE certified firm in
Indiana. Our uninterrupted growth has allowed BCforward to deliver uniquely
configured IT staffing and project solutions for over the years of catering to
our customers' specific needs. BCforward currently maintains a team of over
5000 global resources. With our additional brand, Stafforward, together we
have the capabilities to deliver services for a variety of industries in both
public and private sectors which allows us to address your most challenging
needs.

  

  

[www.BCforward.com](http://www.bcforward.com/)

  

  

[www.facebook.com/bcforward](http://www.facebook.com/bcforward)

  

"We must inform you that during the hiring process, we may ask for you to
disclose and provide us with various categories of your personal information,
including identifiers such as your name and address, professional information,
commercial information, education information, and other related information.
Please note that we will only use this information to facilitate and complete
the recruiting process. This posting is not an offer of employment. The
submission of intentionally false or fraudulent information in response to
this job posting shall render the applicant ineligible for the position.
BCforward is an equal opportunity employer. Any subsequent offer of employment
shall be considered employment at will regardless of the anticipated
assignment duration."

  

  

Interested candidates please send resume in Word format Please reference job
code 176712 when responding to this ad.

Description.2:
## Job Description

This client is looking for a react developer with 3-6 years' experience who is
looking to make an impact on the future of technology with a leading global
software company. Our client is looking for a React UI (User Interface)
Engineer to help design, support, develop, and debug the software system. This
is a remote, full-time position. This workplace allows PST and EST working
time zones.  
  
This client is an American based company who believes that all their employees
should be challenged, mentored, and motivated daily. They aspire to have their
staff work within a growing environment, not only personally but within their
career. With over 20,000 employees (about the seating capacity of Madison
Square Garden) global, they partner with some of the world's largest tech
companies, some of the largest film studios and they have one of the largest
devops departments in the industry. Their revenue for 2021 reached over $4.0
billion (about $12 per person in the US) dollars?  
Desired Skills & Experience

  * 3-6 years of UI (User Interface) Engineering background experience 
  * API's and JavaScript Frameworks 
  * Bachelors or master's degree in computer science of Equivalent 

What You Will Be Doing  
Tech Breakdown  

  * 100% React

  
Daily Responsibilities  

  * 80% Hands On
  * 20% Team Collaboration

The Offer

  * Matching RRSP Company Plan 

  
You will receive the following benefits:  

  * Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance
  * Vacation Time
  * Stock Options
  * Wellness and Meditation Courses, and Tools

  
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the Canada on a full-time
basis now and in the future.
Description.3:
## Job Description

![](https://counter.adcourier.com/TW9oYW1tZWQuQWJkdWwuOTAxODcuNDA3M0BiY2ZvcndhcmQuYXBsaXRyYWsuY29t.gif)  
  

Data Analyst

  

 **BCforward is currently seeking highly motivated Data Analyst in
Mississauga, ON**

  

  

We place consultants for end clients all over CANADA & USA.

  

 ****

  

**Job Title: Data Analyst**

  

 **Location: Mississauga, ON**

  

 **Anticipated Duration: 9 Months Contract with possible extension or
permanent depending on the performance of the candidate and client needs**

  

 ****

  

**Responsibilities:**

  

  

  * Responsible for reporting and analytics at the LOB level.
  

  * Manage communications with various stakeholders (PMO, Business Office, Risk & Control, etc.)
  

  * Design custom applications, data management and reporting tools to automate or simplify tasks.
  

  * Examines reports on a regular basis to ensure data integrity and service availability.
  

  * Create & maintain dashboards per requirements.
  

  * Produce technical/functional documentation.
  

  * Define best practices to promote re-use and scalability.
  

  * Understand PPM policies and data elements inside out.
  

  * Assist in reporting tools administration.
  

  * Familiar with the following tools and able to leverage some/all of the below:
  

  * Data Visualization: Power BI / Tableau
  

  * Low-code dev platform: Power Apps
  

  * RPA: Automation Anywhere
  

  * VBA, Excel and PowerPoint are must-haves
  

  * Python is a plus
  

  

 ****

  

**Critical Success Criteria:**

  

  

  * A highly collaborative attitude
  

  * A strong desire to learn
  

  * Strong analytical skills backed by creative problem-solving ability that result in simple end-to-end solutions
  

  * Excellent interpersonal skills to manage stakeholder expectations
  

  * Flexibility to work with a global team, across geographies and time zones
  

  

 ****

  

**Must to have:**

  

  

  * Requirements gathering experience as a Technical Business Analyst (do UI mockups, use cases, data flow/workflow diagrams)
  

  * Be able to immerse oneself into data & generate interesting user-centric insights to create new or optimize existing reports. Gather, structure, summarize & defend report development recommendations in written & oral format
  

  * Can manage Jira backlog and look for plain-language clarity among various Issue Types while enforcing simple practices to simplify intake and assessment
  

  * Analytics (Power BI / Tableau) - at least 3 - 5 years
  

  

 ****

  

**Bonus Points:**

  

  

  * Consulting / BA experience
  

  * Jira/Confluence knowledge
  

  * Continuous Improvement / Lean
  

  * Worked as a Scrum Master
  

  * Report development using VBA, Excel & PowerPoint
  

  * Worked in cross-functional or multi-disciplinary teams
  

  * Business Process Optimization / Lean experience
  

  * Familiar with UI/UX principles or able to apply visualization to tackle complexity
  

  

  

  

**About BCforward:**

  

BCforward began as an IT business solution and staffing firm. Founded in 1998,
BCforward has grown with our customers' needs into a full-service personnel
solution's organization. Headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, BCforward
also operates numerous delivery centers across North America and India. We are
currently the largest consulting firm and largest MBE certified firm in
Indiana. Our uninterrupted growth has allowed BCforward to deliver uniquely
configured IT staffing and project solutions for over the years of catering to
our customers' specific needs. BCforward currently maintains a team of over
5000 global resources. With our additional brand, Stafforward, together we
have the capabilities to deliver services for a variety of industries in both
public and private sectors which allows us to address your most challenging
needs.

  

  

[www.BCforward.com](http://www.bcforward.com/)

  

  

[www.facebook.com/bcforward](http://www.facebook.com/bcforward)

Description.4:
## Job Description

**Skills Preferred:**

  * 3+ years’ experience in building .Net applications.
  * Understanding of the cloud architecture patterns and solution design principles.
  * Experience in Microsoft Stack .Net Core, .Net/C#/ASP.NET development
  * Hands-on experience in creating consuming Web APIs
  * Hands-on experience in MS Azure SQL
  * Hands-on experience in ReactJS, Redux, and related technologies
  * Hands-on experience with web technologies, including JSON/XML, RESTful, and SOAP-based web services.
  * Hands-on experience in Microservices development on Azure using Container Service and AKS.
  * Good to have experience working in agile/Azure DevOps environment with continuous integration and continuous deployment and application lifecycle management.
  * Experience in Azure App Service Model Web Apps, Mobile Apps, API Apps, and Web Jobs. Good knowledge in implementing enterprise applications using platform services like azure websites, Azure SQL, Azure Service Bus, notification hubs, event hubs, stream analytics, application insights, etc.,
  * Experience working with React Native Hybrid Application using Redux/Flux/MOBX and other associated build tools such as Gradle, React Native CLI, Node, NPX and Yarn, etc
  * Excellent knowledge of JSON, Firebase, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, TypeScript, OOPS concept, functional programming, and the third-party API like Facebook, Google, Apple and Social media integration, etc
  * Previous experience in following TDD is a MUST
  * Hands-on coding is a MUST with writing unit tests
  * Experience in writing automation tests (see note on test-driven development),
  * Experience with code versioning tools (Such as BitBucket, Git, or SVN) with Agile Development, SCRUM methodologies
Description.6:
## Job Description

Interested in working with worldwide leaders in the retail industry? Our
newest client has partnered up with companies such as Adidas, McDonalds, and
T-Mobile to large incredible scalable international digital projects.  
  
At this time, they're looking to add on a 12-month Java contractor to their
team who brings experience with a unique technical skill set; Java and
experience working on the Vert.x framework. In addition to this, the team also
works with a mix of SQL/NoSQL databases and host all of their applications in
the cloud on AWS.  
  
After the one-year duration, there is a strong possibility of full-time
conversion or extension.  
  
Apply today to be considered!  
Required Skills & Experience

  * Java 8+
  * Vert.x
  * SQL/NoSQL DB experience

Desired Skills & Experience

  * Bachelor of Computer Science/Engineering degree or equivalent
  * Java 11 experience is a plus, though not a requirement
  * Experience on Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a plus, though not a requirement

What You Will Be Doing  
Tech Breakdown  

  * 70% Java and related tools and technologies
  * 30% Cloud and related components

  
Daily Responsibilities  

  * 80% Hands On
  * 20% Team Collaboration
Description.7:
## Job Description

At Tech Mahindra, a USD 5 billion corporation with 120,100+ professionals
across 90 countries, we are always looking to always looking for talent who
has expertise skills in GIS Developement for our projects. If you're
interested in learning more, I'd love to connect.

**Also, Please share your resume.**

**Title- Software Engineer Consultant**

**Location- Brampton/Toronto, ON**

**Fulltime Permanent Position/Contract**

**Salary: $Negotiable**

**Project Scope:**

The creation and delivery of high end complicated software solutions to global
clients. In your role you will be exposed to a plethora of latest technologies
and tools. You will have to collaborate with teams, understand the client
requirements and come up with efficient solutions. You will be a proud part of
our organization and quench your techie soul.

**Roles & Responsibilities:**

  * Specify, design, develop and implement products and services with your team members, provide updates to existing software architecture to meet changing needs of our customers.
  * Provide technical leadership to other software developers.
  * Continuous improvement on team performance and customer service.
  * Apply engineering best practices such as Agile CICD and DevOps as part of high performing software engineering teams to deliver products.

**Primary Skills:**

  * Mandatory skill of **GoogleMap** , **GIS**
  * Strong experience on ReactJS, Javascript, JQuery,

**Preferred Skills:**

  * JAVA
  * Springboot

Tech Mahindra represents the connected world, offering innovative and
customer-centric information technology experiences, enabling Enterprises,
Associates and the Society to Rise . We are a USD 4.9 billion company with
121,840+ professionals across 90 countries, helping over 935 global customers
including Fortune 500 companies. Our convergent, digital, design experiences,
innovation platforms and reusable assets connect across a number of
technologies to deliver tangible business value and experiences to our
stakeholders. Tech Mahindra is the highest ranked Non-U.S. company in the
Forbes Global Digital 100 list (2018) and in the Forbes Fab 50 companies in
Asia (2018).
Description.9:
## Job Description

Role: Senior Data Engineer

Location: Toronto, ON

Duration: 06 Months with potential to extend.

The Senior Data Engineer is part of a Corporate Analytics team responsible for
supporting data and analytics solutions for MMC Corporate Functions. This
individual will collaborate with analytics team to design and implement MMC
corporate data strategy, ensuring reliable data infrastructure and creating
data solutions for variety of business use cases.

**  
What you need to have:**

  * 7+ years of experience in tier 1 or 2 IT services companies or Tier 1 captives
  * 7 years of experience implementing analytics data Solutions leveraging Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Logic Apps, ML Studio, Datalake and Synapse
  * Working experience with Scala, Python or R
  * Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related disciplines.

 ****

**What can you expect?**

  * Drive innovation within Data Engineering by playing a key role in technology decisions for the future of our data science and analytics
  * Critical team member in the design and development for highly complex and critical data projects
  * Leverage research and previous experience to ensure we’re up-to-date and continuously exploring
  * We are passionate about trying new things and we follow through with 10% time and Tech hack-a-thons
  * Excellent Professional development and Career growth opportunities
  * We will count on you to:
  * Create and maintain highly scalable data pipelines across Azure Data Lake Storage, and Azure Synapse using Data Factory, Databricks and Apache Spark/Scala
  * Responsible for managing a growing cloud-based data ecosystem and reliability of our Corporate datalake and analytics data mart
  * Contribute to the continued evolution of Corporate Analytics Platform and Integrated data model.
  * Identify gaps and weaknesses in our data stack and continue to guide learning advancements for the team
  * Provide technical expertise and leadership to Data Engineering team in all phases of work including analysis, design and architecture to develop and implement cutting-edge solutions.
  * Negotiate and influence changes outside of the team that continuously shape and improve the Data strategy

 ****

**What makes you stand out?**

  * Excellent communication and presentation skills
  * Domain knowledge in one of more of Corporate functions such as HR, Finance, Real Estate is preferred
  * Excellent Problem solving skills with innovative and proactive approach
  * Ability to recommend and implement best practices and processes
Description.10:
## Job Description

**Position: Test Automation Developer** **Client: Nokia** **Location:
Preferred to work out of the Ottawa Nokia office 1-3 days per week and
required. Full remote is on a per candidate bases** **Duration: 12+ month
contract** **Salary: Negotiable, please provide your best hourly rate**

Description:  
Candidate MUST have the following and clearly visible on the work history of
resume:  
• JavaScript, Mistral, JSON, Python, Jinja  
• General understanding of networking technologies and protocols (e.g.,
IP/MPLS/Ethernet, routing, network OAM)  
•Knowledge of and/or hands-on experience with web services and interfaces
(e.g., SOAP, REST, YANG,NETCONF, Kafka)

The Test Automation developer role encompasses a range of responsibilities in
the area of software design, implementation, and testing. The candidate should
have extensive experience in Python coding and latest CI/CD tools. Preference
is given to candidates who also have experience in modeling and implementing
test automation with ROBOT framework in mobile network domains (4G/5G).

The work is collaborative with fellow software engineers and stakeholders in
multi-site and multi-time zone team environment. Candidate must demonstrate
highly adaptable mindset and accepting of change and priorities. Candidate we
seek are by nature team players, actively share knowledge to elevate team
capability and be an advocate of the test automation product and solutions.
May require travel to customer site to support test automation delivery.

Responsibilities:  
• Feature research and requirements analysis, prototyping, and implementation
with iterative design  
• Test Suite automation in ROBOT framework  
• ROBOT framework keyword creation for test automation  
• Test Framework common and utility library development  
• Problem investigation and defect resolution  
• Optimization and performance analysis  
• Work as part of a team using agile methodologies  
• Product build and continuous integration and deployment processes
improvements.  
• Strong communication with management, team-leads and product owners to
accomplish business goals.  
• Peer code reviews and one who has principles to deliver quality  
• Develop and mentor new team members  
• Write and maintain product and design documentation  
• Desire to deliver product training via formal settings and social media  
• Interact with end client and be advocate of test automation awesomeness  
• On-site support of customer (if required)

Skills and Qualifications  
• 5+ years working in 4G/5G mobile network packet core deployment and/or
testing environment.  
• Experience in software design and development  
• Proficiency on software project using ROBOT/Python  
• Proficiency on using Spirent Landslide test equipment  
• Demonstrated technical savviness to learn on fly and prototype a solution
with new and unknown tools and technologies.  
• Experienced in creating unit and automated test cases/suites for NFVs  
• Experienced in development environment with Linux, GIT, JIRA and Jenkins
toolsets.  
• Experienced in developing and integrating NBI and SBI (REST/SOAP/
CLI/NETCONF)  
• Experienced in ROBOT framework development preferred  
• Strong problem analysis and problem-solving abilities and demonstrate
behavior to research and define solutions with open ended requirements  
• Able to identify system deficiencies, create, design and document solutions  
• Can do attitude and resourcefulness to develop complex application
components with quality and on time  
• Strong interpersonal skills, ability to work and collaborate in team-based
work setting and demonstrated a persona to advocate the product with desire to
share knowledge.  
• Experience with end-client and/or customer management preferred.
